name: Neo-Snake
description:
LEFT/RIGHT - steer left/right

UP - Speed up

You can play it on PC, Mac and Android!

Neo-Snake is a new and improved Snake experience for you to enjoy!

If you are tired of the same Snake clones over and over again, try Neo-Snake, which includes:  

  

Smooth controls - Slide in any 360 degrees direction!

Customisation - Customise your snake's skin, face, shape, as well as the fruits you collect!

Features - Multiple innovative pickups, including portals!
